column2: Nonfat mango lassi with spices just like in the Indian restaurants.
This is JUST like making a grilled cheese, but you are using chocolate! Created this while craving chocolate and carbs.
Top your smooth and creamy Milk Chocolate Cheesecake with generous spoonfuls of whipped cream and fresh strawberries.
This mac and cheese has an intense sharp Cheddar cheese flavor with the kick of the jalapenos.
Ham and cheese using naan bread.

If you like restaurant vanilla bean cheesecake, then try this!  The cookies make this one much more special and far more yummy. Pure vanilla bean extract is a must.  I use Tahitian vanilla beans and extract.  This also makes more than enough batter for a 10 inch pan, so you can make cupcakes too.
Creamy mac and cheese gets a spicy kick with the addition of chipotle peppers and pepper jack cheese.

This chicken is grilled after being marinated in a spicy marinade. The chipotle chiles give the marinade its smoky flavor. You can increase the heat to your liking with your favorite hot sauce. Habanero hot sauce works best, as very little is needed to increase the heat without changing the flavor of the marinade. I think mesquite charcoal works best as it enhances the flavor.
